product_name: MILK MAKEUPHydro Grip 12-Hour Hydrating Gel Skin Tint
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganGive BackMilk Makeup Hydro Grip Gel Tint is a non-comedogenic 12-hour hydrating gel skin tint with buildable light coverage and a natural dewy finish.
details: DetailsBenefitsLongwear skin tint lasts up to 12 hours (it's the skin tint that won't quit!)Buildable light to medium coverageNatural dewy finishWeightless gel base doesn't feel heavy or greasyClinically proven to boost hydration by 24%*No fading, caking, creasing, or settling into fine linesSuped-up skincare visibly smooths skin + helps protect your skin barrier15 diverse + inclusive shadeSafe for sensitive + acne-prone skinNo fragrance or siliconeNon-comedogenic (so it won’t clog pores)Dermatologist testedFragrance-free. Paraben-free. Silicone-free.*In a clinical hydration study of 29 people 30 minutes after using the product.Key IngredientsTriple-Powered Hyaluronic Acid (aka Triluronic Acid), an amped-up form of HA that combines 3 molecular weights to deeply hydrate + support your skin barrierNiacinamide and squalane help boost moisture + visibly smooth skinBlue agave extract keeps makeup gripped on for up to 12 hours to prevent fading, caking, and creasingResearch ResultsIn a consumer perception study of 31 people using the product immediately after application:100% said it doesn't cake, look patchy, or irritate skin96% said skin looks and feels smoother with a fresh, dewy glow93% said it doesn't settle in fine lines + wrinklesItem 2634680How To UseApply over clean, prepped skin.Blend with a brush, sponge, or fingertips.Start with one layer for light coverage and build for medium coverage.Pro Tip: Triple the grip! Prep your base with Hydro Grip Primer and lock in everything with Hydro Grip Set + Refresh Spray (both sold separately).IngredientsAqua/Water/Eau, Isononyl Isononanoate, Propanediol, Isostearyl Neopentanoate, Glycerin, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Polyglyceryl-2 Dipolyhydroxystearate, Saccharomyces/Xylinum/Black Tea Ferment, Hydrogenated Ethylhexyl Olivate, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Dicaprylyl Ether, Polyglyceryl-6 Polyricinoleate, Squalane, Polyglyceryl-3 Diisostearate, Dimer Dilinoleyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Pullulan, Niacinamide, Sodium Hyaluronate, Cannabis Sativa (Hemp) Seed Oil, Agave Tequilana Leaf Extract, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Hydrogenated Olive Oil Unsaponifiables, Tocopherol, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Lecithin, Dipalmitoyl Hydroxyproline, Magnesium Sulfate, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Propylene Carbonate, Hydrogenated Styrene/Methylstyrene/Indene Copolymer, Lauroyl Lysine, Stearic Acid, Zinc Stearate, Allantoin, Distarch Phosphate, Palmitic Acid, Maltose, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Sodium Benzoate, Phenoxyethanol, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply over clean, prepped skin.Blend with a brush, sponge, or fingertips.Start with one layer for light coverage and build for medium coverage.Pro Tip: Triple the grip! Prep your base with Hydro Grip Primer and lock in everything with Hydro Grip Set + Refresh Spray (both sold separately).

reviews.headline: Best
reviews.comments: This looks beautiful on your skin , I don't need moisturizer with this product

reviews.headline: very hydrating
reviews.comments: very hydrating and light weight, it blends well with skin. its not for people with oily skin

reviews.headline: My New Go To
reviews.comments: I love how it evens my skin tone and blends very well!

reviews.headline: Lightweight with POWER!
reviews.comments: I love this product… I've worn it for 2 days to see if I actually like it, and I love it! Very lightweight with staying power. Product was very hydrating and felt like it was barely there… light to medium coverage and a little goes a long way!! Buy it!!

reviews.headline: Makes my skin itchy
reviews.comments: When i would wear this foundation i would get a tingly itchy feeling on my face. Its not noticble enough to immediately take it off my face but there are instances through the day where i want to scratch my face. I think there might be an ingredient in here that is causing this reaction. It does its job though. Very glowy and buildable coverage. I would recommend this for someone who doesnt have sensitive skin. Also if you gave oily skin use a matte primer. Trust me itll help you out.

reviews.headline: Love the finish
reviews.comments: This tint is so hydrating and works so well with all the other products I already use!

reviews.headline: Not for Dry Skin
reviews.comments: I tried wearing a light layer of this and it make my skin flake off and patchy. Was super blotchy and almost cakey. I would not recommend this for dry skin!! Especially in hot weather, it was not holding up.

reviews.headline: Love this Skin Tint - Color Photography could be better
reviews.comments: The marketing photography made it seem like I would be #3. I swatched in store and it turns out I'm #1. I do love the product, but I'm stuck with an extra one since I bought it a while ago.

reviews.headline: Thick formula, tacky feel
reviews.comments: Had to return it. Thick and heavybto apply, and it najes your skin feel sticky ir tacky. That said, it did privide a nice naturak finish and had real stayyng power through hot days. I husg didnt like the heavy, sticky feel of it.

reviews.headline: Avoid with sensitive skin
reviews.comments: This product gave me a horrific rash on my face. Additionally it oxidized very dark!

reviews.headline: Perfect
reviews.comments: this gave me the perfect amount of coverage and felt super light on my skin! obsessed

reviews.headline: Favorite new skin tint
reviews.comments: As an oily skin girly it's hard to find a skin tint that looks natural but won't break me out and doesn't look too oily. Once I set this with powder products it looks like I'm not wearing anything.

reviews.headline: Hydro Grip - new favorite
reviews.comments: Ive never used a product like this! The formula is so unique. I love the coverage and I've never had a skin match so perfect you couldnt even tell i had something on! I also like that it has trioloronic acid its like hyaloronic acids multi demensional big sister so it hydrates even deeper.  I do wish this had spf but i jus put it on underneath miced with my primer and still looks perfect!

reviews.headline: An oily skin girls' dream
reviews.comments: Really impressed by this skin tint. Beautiful medium coverage that lasted all day. Literally wore for 14 hours. Definitely keeping in my collection.

reviews.headline: Light and even foundation
reviews.comments: Love this so much. It doesnt settle into lines or grip dry skin. Even coverage, hydrating and pretty finish.

reviews.headline: Amazing skin tint
reviews.comments: I am in love with this skin tint. I reach for more than any foundation in my collection. It goes on so nicely with fingers, a brush, or a sponge. My skin (which is in pretty good shape already) looks absolutely amazing when i wear this. I have used many "skin tints" in the past but this is the only one I've found that lasts as long as it says it will. I can get a full 12 hours out of this skin tint.

reviews.headline: SAFE FOR ROSACEA!
reviews.comments:
I have been searching FOREVER, for years for a foundation that I could use with how sensitive my rosacea is. I've tried so many things to the point where even mineral baby sunscreen makes my skin reactive. I finally am able to enjoy makeup again with this foundation! I'm so greatful for this product :))

Only con is that it doesn't last all day, however also put a very light layer on. Even with a light layer, it looks seemless and matches my skintone perfectly. If you have very sensitive skin like me, please try this because it really impacted me positively. I'm able to finally feel and look beautiful when I wear makeup and not worry about a flare-up.

This is great for the summer! Fingers crossed that it hold up in the winter as well and does not react with my dryer skin in the winter :))

reviews.headline: Please change the packaging!
reviews.comments: This formula is great however the next day after i had used it and closed it properly it leaked all over my makeup bag. No telling how much of my brand new tube just got wasted. I wont purchase again until theres a new package that isn't wasteful. Too expensive to be wasted!

reviews.headline: My #1 skin tint
reviews.comments: It really gives my face a soft radiant glow and compliments the rest of my makeup.

reviews.headline: Amazing skin tint
reviews.comments:
I am jaded from other skin tints but really wanted to try this one and I'm SO glad that I did. I LOVE IT!!! Lasts on my skin for my 10+ hour work shifts. Sheer enough for a light coverage but can build it up. I use my face sunscreen underneath and apply this directly on top and haven't experienced transfer problems or it rubbing off through the day. One of the best makeup products I own.
I am naturally dry skinned and have tried loads od foundations and skin tints, I will continue to buy this product!!!

media.headline: I love this skin tint for the Spring/Summer Season!
media.caption: MILK MAKEUP Hydro Grip Gel Skin Tint

faceoff_positive.comments: I've tried so many skin tints because I recently developed a sensitivity to an ingredient in my go-to tinted sunscreen. I prefer something low maintenance like a skin tint, but I have oily skin, so they often don't last. This lasts most of the day at least now in winter, if I set it with a powder and do occasional blotting. It's medium coverage, yet somehow the shade seems flexible? It's the only tint I've tried that truly does seem to blur imperfections. It doesn't completely cover them, but skin looks noticeably more even toned. It does go on sticky, which might be a dealbreaker for some—if doesn't have the serum like texture of other tints—but it does dry down after a while. It's dewey, so may not be a fit if you're super oily or want a matte finish. I found it best to use my fingers and use a little at a time! I think part of the explanation for the low ratings is that people are using it more like a foundation and painting it on and that's way too heavy handed for this. Also this is a much better price point for the performance as opposed to other skin tints. I think it's worth a try.
faceoff_positive.headline: Best Skin Tint I've tried so far

faceoff_negative.comments:
I had high hopes for this skin tint after seeing so many glowing reviews on YouTube. The claims of innovation, hydration, and a glowy finish made me want to run to Ulta to try it out. Even the girl working there was excited about it—but unfortunately, they didn't have her shade.

I picked up shade 5, which wasn't a perfect match but could be made to work with some bronzer and blush. Right away, I noticed the coverage was insanely sheer—like barely there even with multiple thin layers. If you love ultra-light no makeup coverage, this might be for you, but personally, I was expecting a little more. 

The texture leaned more dewy than I anticipated, bordering on greasy on it's own no powder. It didn't sit great around my nose, emphasizing fine lines instead of smoothing them. And the strangest part? When I lightly pressed my cheek, I literally saw my fingerprint in the product. That was… unexpected.

I ended up returning it and will be trying something else instead. I wanted to love this, but it just didn't work for me.
faceoff_negative.headline: Overhyped or Innovative

rollup.name: Hydro Grip 12-Hour Hydrating Gel Skin Tint
